title: nnUNet configuration template
description: A JSON template used to set the configuration parameters for experiments based on nnUNet framework.

Experiment Name.description: String describing the experiment, usually related to the selected DL framework/architecture. Example: "nnUNet_3D_fullres"

Seed.description: Random seed number used when randomizing events and actions. Example: 12345

label_suffix.description: File suffix (including file extension) of the files containing the label map. Example: "_mask.nii.gz"

Modalities.description: Dictionary listing the input modalities. The key-value pair contains the file suffix as key and the modality name as value. Example: "_image.nii.gz": "CT"

label_dict.description: Dictionary describing the labels (excluding the background). The key-value pair contains the label description as key and the label value as value (starting from 0). Example: "Background":0

n_folds.description: Number of folds to run cross-validation. Example: 5.

FileExtension.description: String for the file extension of the dataset. "Example: .nii.gz"
